entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , East Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:43 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: East Point 07:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -7.0°C
Wind: ESE 23 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow or ice pellets. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets this morning then to rain this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this morning and early this afternoon. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then light this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023
